"You may have done it, but you didn't do it like I did. I managed to close the door with just one hand while juggling a basketball."
"I know everyone else managed to do it, but I had to fix the door first. It was jammed and wouldn't budge."
"I was in the middle of a game of hide and seek when I had to find the door. It took me a few extra seconds, but I found it!"
"I was in a rush and didn't have time to close the door properly. Everyone else managed to do it, but I had to come back and fix it later."
"I was trying to do it with my eyes closed, but I couldn't quite get it right. Everyone else managed to do it, but I had to try again."
